name: Minotaur Lair
description:
This canyon is described in limited detail in Canyons Near Sydney by Rick Jamieson. Help the Australian canyoning community by contributing track notes to ropewiki.com

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

Named "Bell Miner canyon" by Andrew Valja in May 2002 due to the Bellbirds in this vicinity.

Subsequently named Minotaur Lair by Michael Keats on a Bush Club walk, 21st July 2010. "It is labyrinthine, it is mysterious, it is serpentine, it is long and it is varied; it is a special place."
